inputs.worldPrompt: Generate a vast fantasy world with diverse biomes based on temperature and humidity, including monsters, wildlife, and hidden ruins.

settings.worldDescription: A vast natural world filled with diverse landscapes, hidden ruins, and varied wildlife.

biomes.biomeDescription: An empty desert, hot and dry.

items.displayDescription: A blade lost in a sea of sand.

biomes.biomeDescription: A desolate, arid plateau of red sands and jagged rocks.
A hot landscape of dark soil and jagged volcanic rock formations.
A dense, regular forest teeming with natural resources.
Ancient, overgrown remnants of a forgotten civilization.
A deep valley, completely deprived of any heat source.
Lust grassland filled with flowers and animals.

items.displayDescription: A blade lost in a sea of sand.

biomes.biomeDescription: An overgrown wilderness of giant trees and dense vines, thriving in perpetual heat and heavy rainfall.

inputs.worldPrompt: Generate a massive modern metropolis divided into distinct districts based on wealth and urbanization.

settings.worldDescription: A massive, dense modern city bustling with corporate workers, heavy traffic, and industrial sectors.

biomes.biomeDescription: The heart of the city, packed with towering office buildings and corporate workers.
A dense network of shops, stalls, and heavy foot traffic.
A polluted sector filled with warehouses and machinery.
A neglected, decaying neighborhood with high poverty and petty crime.
A maintained green space surrounded by the dense city.
The very edge of the city.
An area of active development, filled with scaffolding, materials, and concrete.
